document.full_text: jellyfish have long been dismissed as so much mindless protoplasm with a mouth. now, in a series of new studies, researchers have found that there is far more complexity and nuance to a jellyfish than meets the eye.
document.title: so much more than plasma and poison
lines_and_colors: jellyfish have long been dismissed as so much mindless protoplasm with a mouth. now, in a series of new studies, researchers have found that there is far more complexity and nuance to a jellyfish than meets the eye.
